intro.heading: Professional Septic System Installation for Homes & Businesses
intro.content: Bellhouse Excavating installs septic tanks, drainage beds, and complete systems according to local codes and engineering guidelines. We provide safe excavation, proper grading, and long-lasting installations.
keypoints: Septic tank excavation and proper placement

includes.heading: Septic System Installation Scope
includes.subheading: We install complete septic systems from excavation to final grading.

items.title: Tank Excavation & Placement
items.description: Digging to engineered depth and placing tanks with proper bedding.

items.title: Trench & Drainage Field Installation
items.description: We follow engineered designs for lateral pipes, stone, and filter cloth.

items.title: Soil Backfilling
items.description: Controlled backfills that protect tanks and pipes from shifting.

items.title: Final Grading
items.description: We shape the area for proper drainage and long-term performance.

equipment.heading: Equipment Used

items.title: Tri-Axle Dump Trucks
items.description: Transporting sand, gravel, and removing excess soil.

items.title: Diesel Plate Tamper
items.description: Compacts around tanks and trenches to prevent settling.

process.heading: How Our Septic Installation Works

items.question: Do you handle engineering?
items.answer: Engineering must be completed before installation, but we work directly with your engineer.

items.question: Can you replace failing systems?
items.answer: Yes, we remove and replace outdated systems.

items.question: Do you install tanks for new builds?
items.answer: Yes, we work with builders and homeowners.
